post.body: That was pretty funny. The "Gas Right" commercial just about killed me! :)
lucky!
did you kill your AS2 and AS3 references? Links now go here http://snipurl.com/7safa
ha! awesome. Don't you mean @michaelwsmith?
I didn't see that coming to be honest. But when you think about it, J.J. probably has the most trade value (other than Ichiro)
have fun!
BAM!
huh...well dang. It was just the bumper sticker, "LISTEN to Bob Marley". That's all. :)
try this one http://snipurl.com/7r3ms
sans chocolate chips. banana bread made with sour cream and coconut extract...tasty goodness.
sans chocolate chips. banana bread made with sour cream and coconut extract...tasty goodness.
They were OK. I miss the tartness of the Lemon. If I were to do it again, I'd use no Gran Marnier, and do 1/2 Orange & 1/2 L ...
@dadwygle sweet. gonna give it a go. will twitpic the process. :)
@dadwygle sweet. gonna give it a go. will twitpic the process. :)
I think it should work too. Probably be a bit sweeter and slightly less tart.
I think it should work too. Probably be a bit sweeter and slightly less tart.
of course! that's precisely my thinking. :) if I can keep the texture and presentation and change the flavor, that'd be cool.
of course! that's precisely my thinking. :) if I can keep the texture and presentation and change the flavor, that'd be cool.
We've got oranges. We've got some Gran Marnier. Any ideas?
We've got oranges. We've got some Gran Marnier. Any ideas?
I have a baking question for the resident Twitter food scientist: What would be a good substitute for Lemon in Lemon Bar cookies?
I have a baking question for the resident Twitter food scientist: What would be a good substitute for Lemon in Lemon Bar cookies?
you're watching There Will Be Blood today? I'm on my way over...
you're watching There Will Be Blood today? I'm on my way over...
Deap snow, huh? Is that even possible? ;)
http://twitpic.com/v6z2 - NICE! I can't believe you still have the disks!
would love to do some Big E's. Plus, maybe @cjschaefer would want to join us
FTW!!!
the MH Shoreline staff are stallions. Stallions, I SAY!!
that's hardcore, bro. early adopters get Papyrus Fail immunity in my opinion. :)
did you just create this?!
it really is! loving watching the snow continue to accumulate from inside my cozy house as dinner slow-cooks all day long. Mmmm!
will do
But...30 has 1" compacted snow in various places as well. Overall, though, it's a much shorter distance to I-5. That's the payoff.
That's what I'm feeling too. Just saw a lot of freezing rain on the radar between Astoria & Olympia on 101.
OK...off to bed. G'night all.
Stomach not doing well. I should be asleep, but I'm drinking water, eating toast and watching SNL.
Operation clean kitchen & then bake cookies is 50% done.
OK...back to creating things you touch on screens.
Back from lunch. It was AMAZING. Here's where we went http://www.mattsinthemarket.com/
Off to lunch with Ye Olde CrashShoppe Crew
The M's trade J.J. Putz to the Mets!! http://snipurl.com/7ro2q
I'm awesome. Why? Because I took the wrong bus home, leaving my car at Northgate, where I forgot I parked it this morning.
Oops...here's that link: http://snipurl.com/7r73y
Vodafone & Sony Ericsson sign onto Google's Open Handset Alliance (and Steve Ballmer swallows a bottle of Tums) --> http://snipur ...
CONGRATS to Seattle's Publicis for getting the Top TV Ad nod from Time Magazine - http://snipurl.com/7r4g4
Going to bed, expecting a terrible commute tomorrow. Not sure I'll even be going...but I can't afford not to go.
Going to bed, expecting a terrible commute tomorrow. Not sure I'll even be going...but I can't afford not to go.
Making banana bread. @jentryday thinks I've descended in to baking-induced haze. Wait...not THAT kind of baking. Sheesh...
Making banana bread. @jentryday thinks I've descended in to baking-induced haze. Wait...not THAT kind of baking. Sheesh...
Now back to the West Wing, already in progress.
Retweet @Aadom: Sound and Vision, one of the newer bands @MarsHillChurch http://is.gd/bAiM
http://twitpic.com/spju - Moment of truth
http://twitpic.com/spju - Moment of truth
http://twitpic.com/spfe - SNOW!!!
http://twitpic.com/spfe - SNOW!!!
Dinner is happening right now. Grilled chili-coconut chicken with soy demi-glaze. Almond sauteed asparagus & mojitos. Yum
Dinner is happening right now. Grilled chili-coconut chicken with soy demi-glaze. Almond sauteed asparagus & mojitos. Yum
http://twitpic.com/so5z - Hm. Formed a very interesting (not very appealing) crust on top. Letting cool till dessert later on...
http://twitpic.com/so5z - Hm. Formed a very interesting (not very appealing) crust on top. Letting cool till dessert later on...
http://twitpic.com/snwp - In the oven for 25 min. Anticipation...
http://twitpic.com/snwp - In the oven for 25 min. Anticipation...
http://twitpic.com/snw5 - ZEST!
http://twitpic.com/snw5 - ZEST!
http://twitpic.com/snuf - Next step: put all of these together, pour over crust.
http://twitpic.com/snuf - Next step: put all of these together, pour over crust.
http://twitpic.com/snq0 - Crust is ready to bake.
http://twitpic.com/snq0 - Crust is ready to bake.
Goodnight all. Brushing teeth. Dreaming of snow-shoveling in the morning.
At the end of the day, I'd rather spend my time behind a sweet guitar creating songs that never existed before, than watching TV.
All year I've been planning to beef up my TV set-up with my bonus. Now I'm leaning toward a Martin 000-18 like this http://bit.ly/SiAy
About to shred the BBQ pork that's been slow cooking all day long. Salivating like @jsuffering
Office is clean, organized and actually a very nice place to hang out suddenly. If only @jentryday would let me smoke a cigar in here.
http://twitpic.com/v29u - Uh oh. Old MH Chord Sheets binder label PAPYRUS FAIL.
Cleaning up my office, prepping it to become my brother's bedroom for a few days
My parents are currently driving up the Oregon coast on their way here. Staying at Astoria tonight. Wondering the best route from there.
Making a late breakfast. Poached egges on toasted english muffin with thin slices of cheddar over the top.
